Package org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.basic

Class QueryDataProvider<I>

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.AbstractDataProvider<T,SerializablePredicate<T>>
com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.ListDataProvider<T>
org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin24.data.AsyncDataProvider<I>
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.basic.QueryDataProvider<I>
Type Parameters:
I - query item type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurableFilterDataProvider<I,SerializablePredicate<I>,SerializablePredicate<I>>, DataProvider<I,SerializablePredicate<I>>, InMemoryDataProvider<I>, Serializable
public class QueryDataProvider<I> extends AsyncDataProvider<I>
A DataProvider that can load items from a class by using one of its annotation-defined queries.

This class is handy with FieldBuilder annotations having a dataProvider() or items() property when combined with BasicDisplayHooks, which provides the appropriate context object to this class' constructor.

During construction, will autotmatically load themselves from the default query unless it requires configuration.

See Also:
